locations.theHelmSeasonal: Is/was purchasable in the Helm (Yanita, Houma) in that season
locations.theHelmEvent: Is/was purchasable in the Helm (Yanita, Houma) during that event

locations.personRahma: Admiral Rahma (after completion of her main contracts)
locations.ubisoftStore: Is/was purchasable in the Ubisoft Store

locations.rodeMaangodinChest: Possible drop from Mysterious Chest (obtained when defeating the Rode Maangodin)
locations.infamyReward: Received when reaching a certain infamy rank (listed above)
locations.openBetaReward: Reward for participating in the Open Beta
locations.closedBetaReward: Reward for participating in the Closed Beta
locations.laPesteChest: Possible drop of La Peste's Locker (obtained when defeating La Peste)
locations.laPesteStrongbox: Possible drop of La Peste's Strongbox (obtained when defeating Rank 15 La Peste)

locations.smugglerPass70Reward: Reward for completing 70 stages of the Smuggler Pass.
locations.smugglerPassFinalReward: Final reward for completing all 90 stages of the Smuggler Pass.
locations.insiderReward: Reward for participating in the Insider Program
locations.ubisoftStoreSeasonalPack: Reward when buying the Seasonal Pack from the Ubisoft Store
locations.ubisoftStoreSilverGold: Is/was purchasable from the Ubisoft Store via Gold or Silver
locations.friendReferralProgramTier1: Reward for inviting one friend that afterwards sinks two enemy ships in the game.
locations.friendReferralProgramTier2: Reward for inviting 2 friends that afterwards sink two enemy ships in the game.
locations.friendReferralProgramTier3: Reward for inviting 3 friends that afterwards sink two enemy ships in the game.
locations.friendReferralProgramTier4: Reward for inviting 4 friends that afterwards sink two enemy ships in the game.
locations.friendReferralProgramTier5: Reward for inviting 5 friends that afterwards sink two enemy ships in the game.
locations.rogueTraderLibbieHitch: Rogue Trader Libbie 'The Iron Lady' Hitch
locations.zamaharibuChest: Possible drop from Mysterious Chest (obtained when completing the 'Jaws of Retribution' contract - slaying Zamaharibu)
locations.megaLestariChest: Possible drop from Mysterious Chest (obtained when completing the 'Silent Death' contract - slaying the Mega Lestari)
locations.dropLestari: Possible drop when slaying the sea monster Lestari & Mega Lestari
locations.heavensreachStep1: 1. Collect all 12 star charts and have them in your inventory
locations.heavensreachStep2: 2. Accept the Fates of the Stars contract at the Vorona Falls outpost
locations.heavensreachStep3: 3. Have the required star chart 3 times in your inventory
locations.heavensreachStep4: 4. Hand in the required star chart first in Tenina Town and afterwards in Palisade Bay
locations.heavensreachStep5: 5. Completing the contract will give you the cosmetic
locations.twitchAllAboardCommunityEvent: Redeemable code given out as part of the Twitch All Aboard community event
locations.twitchAllAboardCommunityEventWinningFlee: Received when beeing a streamer of the winning fleet in the Twitch All Aboard community event
locations.premiumEdition: Received as bonus when buying the Premium Edition of the game

locations.msiPromotion: Bonus when buying an selected MSI product as part of an promotion
